title: cmd/godoc: pointer analysis fails
body:
At tip, ran godoc http with type and pointer analysis.
go: 96c74cf6dc10
go.tools: 75a83badcaf5

Got:

2014/06/08 08:37:35 Extracting type info complete
2014/06/08 08:37:35 Running pointer analysis...
Internal panic in pointer analysis:
/home/daniel/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/pointer/analysis.go:212 (0x6cbcc9)
	google.com/p/go.tools/go/pointer.func.001: debug.PrintStack()
/home/daniel/code/go/src/pkg/runtime/panic.c:248 (0x41c8e6)
	panic: runtimeÂ·newstackcall(d->fn, (byte*)d->args, d->siz);
/home/daniel/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/pointer/api.go:105 (0x6a7c25)
	google.com/p/go.tools/go/pointer.(*Config).prog: panic("empty scope")
/home/daniel/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/pointer/analysis.go:219 (0x6a58c0)
	google.com/p/go.tools/go/pointer.Analyze: prog:        config.prog(),
/home/daniel/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/godoc/analysis/analysis.go:500 (0x5200fa)
	google.com/p/go.tools/godoc/analysis.(*analysis).pointer: ptares, err := pointer.Analyze(&a.ptaConfig)
/home/daniel/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/godoc/analysis/analysis.go:443 (0x51f742)
	google.com/p/go.tools/godoc/analysis.Run: a.pointer(mainPkgs)
/home/daniel/code/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:1394 (0x420bf0)
	goexit: gp->status = Gwaiting;
2014/06/08 08:37:35 Pointer analysis failed: internal error in pointer analysis: empty
scope (please report this bug)
